results.title: Overview - Microsoft.Data.Sqlite
results.description: Microsoft.Data.Sqlite overview Microsoft.Data.Sqlite is a lightweight ADO.NET provider for SQLite. The Entity Framework Core provider for SQLite is built on top of this library. However, it can also be used independently or with other da... Installation The latest stable version is available on NuGet.. NET CLI Visual Studio Usage This library.

results.title: Entity Framework documentation hub
results.description: Entity Framework documentation hub Entity Framework is a modern object-relation mapper that lets you build a clean, portable, and high-level data access layer with .NET (C#) across a variety of databases, including SQL Database (on-premises and Azure), SQLite, MySQL, PostgreSQL, and Azure Cosmos DB.  ...ASP.NET Core MVC web app accessing SQL.

results.title: Use a SQLite database in a Windows app - Windows apps
results.description: Use a SQLite database in a Windows app SQLite provides a reliable, lightweight database solution for storing data locally in Windows apps. Unlike traditional database systems that require separate server installations and complex configurations, SQLite runs entirely within your application process and stores data in a single file on the user's.

descriptions.content: Use a SQLite database in a Windows app SQLite provides a reliable, lightweight database solution for storing data locally in Windows apps. Unlike traditional database systems that require separate server installations and complex configurations, SQLite runs entirely within your application process and stores data in a single file on the user's.
